intro.speaker: Caesar
intro.line: Prince Marth, we are mercenaries hired to protect Port Warren. Grust has gathered its forces in the northern fortresses. They have put the port to siege. It's very dangerous here. But there is a castle to the east that looks a bit safer. We should make it our target. Let's head out there together without delay!

visit.speaker: Woman
visit.line: Many foes wait inside the fortresses, ready to enter the battle. Block them so they can't get out!

visit.speaker: Woman
visit.line: I've heard tell that a princess of Macedon is being held captive in Castle Deil. Macedon and Dolhr are supposed to be allies! I wonder what happened...

recruit-battle.speaker: Roger
recruit-battle.line: I don't want to fight. But I've got orders to stop you right here! I am sorry.

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: Hello there. I am Caeda of Talys, and I come in peace.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roger
recruit-talk.line: Ack! You caught me off guard, calling out like that... What do you want?

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: I have a question for you. Do you believe in love? Is there someone that matters to you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roger
recruit-talk.line: Wh-What? What kind of question is that?

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: I apologize. You look very kind, and I thought we might have a chat. Would you mind telling me your name?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roger
recruit-talk.line: Er, well... The name's Roger. Roger of Grust.

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: Roger, I want you to thing about something... Those who cry because of war. We in the Archanean League wish to put an end to fighting, to this sadness. Surely you can understand this.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roger
recruit-talk.line: Of course I do. I don't fight because I enjoy it... But I can't betray my homeland.

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: Is there someone precious to you in Grust?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roger
recruit-talk.line: My parents have passed on, and I am unmarried... But betraying my homeland is out of the question!

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: So what I ask is impossible?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roger
recruit-talk.line: I am sorry to say so, but yes.

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: And I am sorry to hear it. I do understand. Still, I was glad to speak. You are the man I expected.

recruit-talk.speaker: Caeda
recruit-talk.line: I must. If I stay with you too long, your comrades might think you a turncoat.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roger
recruit-talk.line: You are too kind... Why can't I meet someone like you in Grust? Hey... Wait a moment. I... I don't want you to leave. I am on my own, so...I will join you.

end.speaker: Malledus
end.line: Prince, if we stay here, we'd be putting ourselves in danger. We must head to Pyrathi with haste. There are rumors that the Pyrathi king, Mannu, is a descendant of the dragonkin, however. This is also reason for concern. But we have no choice. Please, be cautious.
